steps.content: Starting UI development workflow for "button" component...

Confirming UI element type:

  Mode:    Component (not Page)
  Name:    Button
  Level:   Atom (base-level component)

Let me confirm what you want to build:

  Component: Button
  Purpose:   Clickable UI element for user actions
  Features:  Variants, sizes, states (loading, disabled)
  Output:    Component + Tests + Storybook stories
WebSearch: "CVA class variance authority button patterns"

Research complete. Discovered patterns:

┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  BUTTON COMPONENT - Research Summary                        │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│  Library:    shadcn/ui (Radix primitives + Tailwind)        │
│  Styling:    CVA (class-variance-authority)                 │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│  VARIANTS DISCOVERED:                                       │
│  • default - Primary brand color                            │
│  • destructive - Red/danger actions                         │
│  • outline - Bordered, transparent bg                       │
│  • secondary - Muted/secondary actions                      │
│  • ghost - No border, minimal styling                       │
│  • link - Text-only, underline on hover                     │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│  SIZES DISCOVERED:                                          │
│  • default - Standard size (h-10 px-4)                      │
│  • sm - Small (h-9 px-3)                                    │
│  • lg - Large (h-11 px-8)                                   │
│  • icon - Square icon button (h-10 w-10)                    │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│  STATES:                                                    │
│  • disabled - Reduced opacity, no pointer                   │
│  • loading - Spinner + disabled interactions                │
│  • asChild - Render as different element (Slot)             │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
Should I proceed with these patterns, or search for more?

Based on my research, I have questions about your specific needs.
These questions are generated FROM the discovered component patterns.

Q1/5: shadcn/ui offers 6 variants: default, destructive, outline,
       secondary, ghost, link. Which should we include?
       [a] All 6 variants
       [b] default, destructive, outline only
       [c] Custom selection (specify)
Variants: All 6 (default, destructive, outline, secondary, ghost, link)

Q2/5: Size options discovered: default, sm, lg, icon.
       Which sizes should we implement?
       [a] All 4 sizes
       [b] default, sm, lg only
       [c] default only

Q3/5: Should we include a loading state with spinner?
       [a] Yes, with SVG spinner
       [b] Yes, with custom loader prop
       [c] No loading state
Loading state: Yes with SVG spinner

Q4/5: Accessibility compliance level?
       [a] WCAG 2.1 AA (recommended)
       [b] WCAG 2.1 AAA (stricter)
       [c] Basic accessibility only

Q5/5: Include asChild prop for rendering as different element?
       (e.g., render button as <a> for links)
       [a] Yes, using Radix Slot
       [b] No, standard button only

Based on your choices, I'd like to research:

  1. CVA pattern for 6 variants + 4 sizes
  2. Radix Slot implementation for asChild

These are proposed, not automatic.
